Function changeRoom.

Change the room of a booked lesson

Parameters:
bookID (int) unique ID from the database table Booking determing a certain lesson
room_nr (int) room number where the lesson shall take place
Returns:
xajaxResponse object defining the actions to be executed on the client

moveLesson ( $  curriculumID,
$  zeit,
$  oldTime = 0 
)

Function moveLesson.

Move a lesson to a certain date-time-slot - if empty insert new booking, if $oldTime is set, move it to new time (while deleting it from old time) and if time is already used, show alert window

Parameters:
curriculumID (int) unique ID from the database table Curriculum
zeit (int) time a certain lesson shall be inserted at (Unix timestamp)
oldTime (int) time the lesson to be moved has been before
Returns:
xajaxResponse object defining the actions to be executed on the client
